name: Revenge of Hypnos
description:
''I lost my sleep, and this is the greatest tragedy that can befall someone. It is much worse than sitting in prison''

Hypnos a greek god responsible for sleep. An insomniac who goes crazy day by day and becomes schizophrenic. Tells how she turned a mythological god into his enemy. A narrative consisting of a single photograph in which I describe the difficulties caused by mental problems.
